title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message:
I  have a MaBook Air 820-3435-B it screen went black. I connected external monitor and there was no luck. PMU/SMC reset nothing changed. I removed the SSD rebooted no luck. after running some test on the board i found the flowing.

Q3080  pin 2 and 3 has almost no voltage 0.01x 
L3095  same case there is no voltage. 
Q3080  pin 1 and 3 getting 8.5 volts. 

am i on the correct route ? what should i check or what could be the problem?

Thanks

title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message: The stuff you measured have nothing to do with image, only Thunderbolt. Does the machine chime when turned on?

title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message: Is it even turning on, fan spinning and CPU Vcore present?

title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message: Fan Turns on charge light is on

title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message: CPU Vcore on L7310? USB mouse LED lighting up when plugged in?

title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message: Actually there power to the fan and chim as well when install the ssd.

title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message: USN mouse has power too it lights up vcore is 1.763

title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message: Very interesting thing happened i left the computer on for about an hour suddenly i got a blinking folder. so i used another ssd and the system worked fine. so it seems that the SSD is bad. can we test the SSD somehow ?

title: MacBook  Air 820-3435-B Turns on NO Video internal or external
message: These boards will hang on a black screen with only backlight if the SSD is bad. Just test it in a known good machine, but it is common for it to hang like that.
